parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query region IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The list of gateway IDs. You can attach tags to N gateways at a time. Valid values of N: 1 to 50.

parameters.name: ResourceRegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resource.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Valid value: GATEWAY.
